name: Home Debian
short_description: A distribution based on Debian testing that aims to be intuitive and user-friendly. It's distributed as a LiveDVD, so you can try it without making changes to the disk. It comes with Xfce desktop environment that is easy and configurable. It contains a set of applications for everyday use (media player, graphics editor and so on).
summary: A Linux distribution for home users.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)

os.fullpath: Operating System :: Modern (Vendor-Supported) Desktop Operating Systems :: Linux
